summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for, the payment of the principal amount of the judgement against the City entered in the Superior Court in the case of State of Washington ex rel, B.H. Beebe vs. the City, et al., Cause No. 204237, and the payment of costs (including Supreme Court judgement for costs) and interest to November 8, 1928, and for the payment of additional back salary to said B.H. Beebe, and appropriating the sum of $909.34 from the City Railway Fund therefor.
